entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
